mapper.insert: insert into board(title, descript, nickname, file) values(#{title}, #{descript}, #{nickname}, #{savefile});
mapper.select: select num, title, nickname, date_format(date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as 'date' from board;
select num, title, descript, nickname, file as 'savefile', date_format(date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 %T') as 'date' from board where num = #{num};
